judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Klein of the court below. Costs are to be paid by the appellant in each case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: R. M. Remide, of Saul, Ewing, Remide & Said, with him Jesse S. Shepard, for pecuniary legatee, appellant, No. 171.
Walter C. Janney, Jr., with him Guthbert II. Latta, Jr. and MacCoy, Brittain, Evans & Lewis, for pecuniary legatee, appellant, No. 194.
Ernest Scott, with him Pepper, Bodine, Stolees & Schoch, for pecuniary legatee, appellant, No. 195.
John E. Stevenson and Howard H. Yocum, for pecuniary legatee, appellant, No. 193.
Robert W. Archbald, Jr., of Archbald & Busser, for charity in remainder, appellee.
J. Claude Bedford, for charity in remainder, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:

Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
R. M. Remide, of Saul, Ewing, Remide & Said, with him Jesse S. Shepard, for pecuniary legatee, appellant, No. 171.

September 29, 1941:
